overview:
An OpenRoad partner, Gordon has played a key role in refining the firm’s development methodologies. Since 1996, Gordon has worked through OpenRoad’s project design and development cycles extensively, doing project management, systems analysis and strategy work for some of BC’s largest web projects. His portfolio at OpenRoad includes a wide range of work with clients like the Ministry of Attorney General, Ministry of Transportation, and Rocky Mountain Bicycles.

Gordon earned a BA in Communications at Simon Fraser University. He has taught IT project management and e-business topics for Simon Fraser University and lectured at BCIT and the Vancouver Film School.
